mapper.select: select * from (select rownum no, b.*, ( select user_nm from mst_user_info_tb u where b.user_id=u.user_id ) name from (select * from mst_board_tb where board_gp = 1 order by board_no) b order by no desc) ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.update: update mst_board_tb set board_readcount = board_readcount+1 where board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.insert: insert into mst_board_tb( board_no, root, board_gp, user_id, board_title, board_content, user_type, filename, filepath ) values( MST_BOARD_TB_SEQ.nextval, MST_BOARD_TB_SEQ.currval, 1, #{user_id}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{user_type}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

sql.if: where board_title like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or board_content like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or user_id in ( select user_id from mst_user_info_tb where upper(user_nm) like '%'|| upper(#{keyword}) || '%' )
where user_id in ( select user_id from mst_user_info_tb where upper(user_nm) like '%'|| upper(#{keyword}) || '%' )

mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select * from mst_board_tb where board_gp = 1 )
